name: Alien Sacrificial Predicament!
description:
Alien Robots believe if they sacrifice you they will be blessed with a 17.345% battery increase... But maybe you should sacrifice them for your own sake!

Game made for ludum dare 43, made in 72 hours (well actually like 17 hours when you take out the sleep time and break time) posted to the game jam catergory.

---CONTROLS---

W.A.S.D to move

Space to jump

Left-Shift to sprint

Left-Mouse to shoot

R to reload
